TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstanceKeyNotReadyException extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommandException

Docs.summary: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects to find an instance key in the associated state, but finds the key in the unassociated state.
